ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: Selos Song of Travel
ygData.msgSnippet: Just dinged 51 last night and used this song for the first time.  With Selos Drum equipped, the movement rate with the 51 song seemed to be slower than Selos
ygData.messageBody:
Just dinged 51 last night and used this song for the first time. With Selos
Drum equipped, the movement rate with the 51 song seemed to be slower than
Selos Accelerando. I was in Burning Woods so that may have had an impact on
my perception. Is the speed bonus for these songs the same or is
Accelerando indeed faster? I have read that when you have a regular
levitate buff up and sing Selos, the fastest you will go is SOW speed. This
is approximately how fast I was going last night with SSoT. So either SSoT
is slower because of the levitate effect or my perception was off.

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
